author: Reuters Editorial
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to March 29
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top Economic Events
Government Debt Auctions
Political and General News Events
Index of All Diaries
Guide to Economic Indicators This Diary is filed daily. Indicates new events
WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 14 JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank board of governors meeting. (to Feb. 15). WINDHOEK - Central Bank of Namibia monetary policy meeting. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank monetary policy meeting. BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand monetary policy committee meeting. KAMPALA - Bank of Uganda interest rate decision. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its January 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1300 GMT.
THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 15 ** BAKU, Azerbaijan - Azeri central bank to announce decision on refinancing rate.
SYDNEY - Appearance by Philip Lowe, RBA Governor, before the House of Representatives’ Standing Committee on Economics – 2230 GMT.
CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt monetary policy committee meeting.
MONDAY, FEBRUARY 19 SYDNEY - Speech by Michele Bullock, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial System) at Responsible Lending and Borrowing Summit, Sydney – 2215 GMT.
TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 20 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of February Monetary Policy Meeting – 0030 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland monetary policy council meeting (no interest rate announcement).
THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 22 ATLANTA - Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic speaks before the 2108 Banking Outlook Conference hosted by the Atlanta Fed - 1710 GMT.
WARSAW - National Bank of Poland releases the minutes of its monitory policy meeting. MEXICO - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting.
FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 23 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia Payments System Board Meeting. TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 27
YEREVAN, Armenia - Armenia central bank to publish its inflation report SEOUL - Bank of Korea monetary policy meeting.
BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank rate-setting meeting - 1300 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 28 SINGAPORE - 24th ASEAN Economic Ministers’ Retreat (AEM-R) and 16th AEMEU Trade Commissioner Consultations (to Mar. 2).
THURSDAY, MARCH 1 CHISINAU - National Bank of Moldova interest rate decision.
KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine monetary policy meeting.
TUESDAY, MARCH 6 SYDNEY - Speech by Philip Lowe, RBA Governor, at the AFR Business Summit, Sydney – 2140 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland monetary policy council meeting (to March 7). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia interest rate meeting – 0330 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 7 TBILISI - National Bank of Georgia monetary policy committee meeting. KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia interest rate decision.
THURSDAY, MARCH 8 LIMA – Central bank of Peru interest rate decision. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision. MONDAY, MARCH 12
SYDNEY - Speech by Michele Bullock, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial System), at the Seamless Australia Payments Conference – 2340 GMT. TUESDAY, MARCH 13
SYDNEY - Speech by Christopher Kent, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial Markets), at the KangaNews DCM Summit – 2210GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 14 ANKARA - Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey releases the minutes of its March monetary policy committee meeting. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its February 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1300 GMT.
THURSDAY, MARCH 15 SWITZERLAND - Swiss National Bank (SNB) to assess monetary policy – 0830GMT. FRIDAY, MARCH 16 SYDNEY - Speech by Guy Debelle, RBA Deputy Governor, at the Financial Risk Day
MONDAY, MARCH 19 SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile monetary policy meeting (to March 20). ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria monetary policy meeting (to March 20).
TUESDAY, MARCH 20 SYDNEY - Panel participation by Michele Bullock, Assistant Governor (Financial System), at the ASIC Annual Forum 2018, Sydney – 0415 GMT. BRASILIA- Central Bank of Brazil monetary policy committee meeting (to March 21). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting – 0030 GMT. RABAT - Bank of Morocco monetary policy meeting.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 21 JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank board of governors meeting. (to March 22).
THURSDAY, MARCH 22 MANILA - Philippines Central Bank monetary policy meeting.
FRIDAY, MARCH 23 MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia interest rate decision - 1030 GMT.
MONDAY, MARCH 26 CAPE TOWN - South Africa Reserve Bank starts its three-day monetary policy committee meeting (to March 28).
TUESDAY, MARCH 27 SYDNEY - Speech by Christopher Kent, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial Markets), at the Investment Implementation Summit – 0045 GMT. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland monetary policy meeting. No Interest rate announcement is expected.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 28 BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand monetary policy committee meeting.
THURSDAY, MARCH 29 CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt monetary policy committee meeting. PRAGUE - Czech National Bank monetary policy meeting.
